github.releaseNotes: git log --pretty=format:'- %s' ${latestTag}...HEAD --no-merges | grep -v '^- chore:' | grep -v '^- style:' || echo 'See commits for changes'

hooks.after:bump: npx auto-changelog -p --commit-limit false --ignore-commit-pattern '^((dev|chore|ci):|Release)' && git add CHANGELOG.md
